content: दीधितिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A ray of light; <ls>R. 3. 22</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 48</ls>; <ls>N. 2. 69</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 18.</ls> {@--2@} Splendour, brightness. {@--3@} Bodily lustre, energy; <ls>Bh. 2. 29.</ls> {@--4@} A finger. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A religious prayer or devotion. {@--6@} A son-inlaw. {@--7@} Divine inspiration.
